definition: To propel a projectile from a weapon or device, typically with the intention of hitting a target. This action is commonly associated with firearms, bows, or other similar tools. It can also refer to the act of shooting in sports or recreational activities.

examples.german: Ich schieße gerne mit dem Gewehr.
examples.english: I enjoy shooting with the rifle.

examples.german: Der Jäger schießt auf den Hirsch.
examples.english: The hunter shoots at the deer.

examples.german: Er schießt den Ball ins Tor.
examples.english: He shoots the ball into the goal.

examples.german: Die Soldaten schießen auf den Feind.
examples.english: The soldiers shoot at the enemy.

examples.german: Sie schießt ein Foto von der Landschaft.
examples.english: She takes a photo of the landscape.
